forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 55F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. NNE winds shifting to SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 45F. NNE winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low near 40F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 11C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 51F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 53F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 11C. SE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 52F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
